Primary Domain: Building agent-based market simulation models for price forecasting of real-world stocks and other securities
License: Proprietary; free evaluation version available for research and experimentation (some limitations but no expiration)
Programming Language: No programming skills required. An adaptive form of genetic programming is used to create trading rules. Users can select functions to be used in the genetic programming engine.
User Support: FAQ, documentation, tutorial, examples, forum, email support
3D Capabilities: yes Up to 3 agent properties can be visualized in real-time using 2D graphics and color

Primary Domain: Agent-based general purpose; also supports discrete event and system dynamics simulations.

License: Proprietary; Free Personal Learning Edition available
User Support: Demos; training; online community; ask a question; online help; tutorials; consulting services
GIS Capabilities: yes: supports both tile maps from free online providers and shapefile-based maps
